name: Content Brick Kit for Sitemap
description:
In my first collaboration with FIGMA Community, I tried to make easy the way of creating a website structure and mapping out content using The Content Brick Method inspired by Octopus.do*. I hope it works for you too.


It's highly recommended to use with: User Flow Kit (included in this file) or ProToFlow (plugin)


1- https://www.figma.com/community/file/830510773896272856

2- https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/989539821393693492/ProToFlow



As this is the V1 I really would like to know your thoughts to improve it.


-------------------------------------------

*about Octopus.do


With this online you can also:


- Export site map to hi-quality vector PDF and PRINT

- Use free visual sitemap generator for any XML sitemap

- Estimate project time and cost in a very easy way

- and more


Note:

I'm not sponsored by this company.
